DOC.brief_summary: Oxidative stress inflammation cardiovascular risk factor patient chronic kidney disease ( CKD ) undergo hemodialysis ( HD ) . Nuclear transcription factor play role coordinate expression gene involve inflammation , nuclear factor Kappa B ( NFkB ) increase cytokine synthesis Nuclear factor erythroid 2-related factor 2 ( Nrf2 ) increase transcription gene encode enzyme phase II detoxifying antioxidant enzyme . The aim study evaluate effect resistance exercise program expression transcription factor Nrf2 NF-kB HD patient .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Physical Activities Expression Nrf2 Nf-kb Hemodialysis Patients
DOC.detailed_description: This study include 44 patient regular HD program 25 patient ( 54.5 % woman , age 45.7 ± 15.2 year time dialysis , 71.2 ± 45.5 month ) compose exercise group 19 patient ( 61.5 % woman , age 42.5 ± 13.5 year time dialysis , 70.1 ± 49.9 month ) control group . The exercise program perform HD session , 3 time week ( 36 exercise session ) . Peripheral blood mononuclear cell ( PBMC ) isolate processed expression Nrf2 , NF-kB NADPH quinone oxidoreductase 1 ( NQO1 ) quantitative real-time polymerase chain reaction . Antioxidant enzyme activity ( catalase-CAT glutathione peroxidase-GPx ) , high-sensitivity C-reactive protein ( hs-CRP ) nitric oxide ( NO ) product assess use enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay ( ELISA ) .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion age > 18 year Without motor skill disorder , arteriovenous fistula vascular access upper limb patient maintenance dialysis least 6 month . Patients autoimmune disease , cancer , infectious disease , acquire immunodeficiency syndrome , uncontrolled hypertension , unstable angina , malignant arrhythmia , pregnant , low limb amputee , history stroke , neurological cardiovascular disease ( moderateintensity physical activity routinely recommend ) Taking catabolize drug Under regular exercise Smokers Patients comply < 75 % training exclude .
